# Time (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Lendor]] |
| | *Kalamar:* | The Fate Scribe |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Grumbar, [[Labelas Enoreth]] |

**Granted Power:** You gain [[Improved Initiative (Feat)|Improved Initiative]] as a bonus feat.

**Time Domain Spells**

**1** **[[True Strike (Spell)|True Strike]]****:** You gain +20 on your next attack roll.

**  ** **[[Delay Image (Spell)|Delay Image]]****:** +2 to AC, +1 to saves against direct magical attacks.

**2** **[[Gentle Repose (Spell)|Gentle Repose]]****:** Preserves one corpse.

**3** **[[Haste (Spell)|Haste]]****:** One creature/level moves faster, +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.

**  ** **[[Melee Manager (Spell)|Melee Manager]]****<sup> M</sup>:** Manipulate time to gain +1 AC, initiative and additonal attacks (1/5 levels).

**4** **[[Freedom of Movement (Spell)|Freedom of Movement]]****:** Subject moves normally despite impediments.

**5** **[[Permanency (Spell)|Permanency]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Makes certain spells permanent.

**6** **[[Contingency (Spell)|Contingency]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Sets trigger condition for another spell.

**7 [[Legend Lore (Spell)|Legend Lore]] <sup>MF</sup>:** Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

   **[[Moment of Prescience (Spell)|Moment of Prescience]]****:** You gain insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

   **[[Temporal Eye (Spell)|Temporal Eye]]** **<sup>M F</sup>:** You can scry people or places in another time. 

   **[[Time Conduit (Spell)|Time Conduit]]****:** Create a portal backwards through time.

**8** **[[Foresight (Spell)|Foresight]]****:** “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.

**9** **[[Time Stop (Spell)|Time Stop]]****:** You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 281 |
|---|---|
| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 91-92 |
